    Package Description
    emulator.core.cpu  

    • Uses of CPU in emulator.core.cpu

      Methods in emulator.core.cpu with parameters of type CPU 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void BitTest.bitTest(CPU cpu, byte instruction)
      Tests if a bit is set in a register or byte of memory.
      static void Jump.call(CPU cpu, byte instruction)
      Pushes Program Counter into the stack jumps to a 16-bit address.
      static void Compare.compare(CPU cpu, byte instruction)
      Subtracts a register or byte in memory from register A then sets the flags accordingly.
      static void Decrement.decrement(CPU cpu, byte instruction)
      Decrements a register or 16-bit combined register.
      static void ExclusiveOR.exclusiveOR(CPU cpu, byte instruction)
      Performs a bitwise Exclusive OR operation on a register or byte in memory.
      static void Increment.increment(CPU cpu, byte instruction)
      Increments a register or 16-bit combined register.
      static void Jump.jumpSubroutine(CPU cpu, byte instruction)
      Increments the Program Counter by a signed byte.
      static void Load.load(CPU cpu, byte instruction)
      Transfers memory from ram, registers, and 16-bit registers.
      static void Stack.pop(CPU cpu, byte instruction)
      Retrieves a 16-bit value from the stack and stores it in a register.
      static void Stack.push(CPU cpu, byte instruction)
      Stores a 16-bit register in the stack.
      static void Jump.returnFromCall(CPU cpu, byte instruction)
      Pops a 16-bit address from the stack then loads it into the Program Counter.
      static void BitShift.rotate(CPU cpu, byte instruction, boolean isPrefix)
      Parses instruction and rotates/shifts register or memory.
      static void Subtract.subtract(CPU cpu, byte instruction)
      Subtracts registers and byte of memory.
